review_text: I had a great experience renting from Hertz at this location. There were plenty of cars to choose from, and every vehicle on the lot was brand new, very clean, and in excellent condition. As a Hertz Gold Member, I already had a reservation …

Super quick and easy to collect the car and also drop it off. Follow the signs at the terminal to rental shuttles lane 4. The shuttles come every few minutes. The process to pick up the car was super quick and easy and the car was in good …

When we received our car, it was dirty both inside and out. After contacting the clerk, our concerns were questioned, and the car was only cleaned on the outside. The inside, however, was still full of sticky spots and food leftovers from …

Overall experience of customer service and vehicle were great and Hertz here would have been five stars but they need more buses plain and simple. Acknowledge there are times when surges of customers come through but leaving >5 customers at …

When you pay more compared to other rental car companies, it's because you're expecting better service. But Hertz at Denver Airport fails from the basics. Before picking up the car, I asked if I could upgrade to a slightly larger vehicle …
Roed trip of a lifetime in a jeep for me and my wife. Hertz made it easy for us. 3000miles from Denver to Rapid city, Red lodge Montana, Yellowstone park road trip.

The overall experience with the office staff was great and so was the vehicle I rented. The 2 stars comes because of the very rude hertz shuttle bus driver. A very arrogant and non helpful individual. Luckily Hertz corporate looked into the …

Great prices, good selection of vehicles and really good customer service.
Both pick up and drop off at Denver airport was smooth and efficient.

Hertz oversold cars at the Denver airport leaving hundreds of us stranded for hours. Rent at your own risk. If they had apologized instead of blaming renters for being late (no way that many were late), or if they had offered any …

Horrible experience! Pick up time was set for noon. Received notification that my rental would be held for 2 hours past pickup time. Arrived at 12:45 to pickup to find out that the 20 minute away from me location closed at noon!!! …

There's a line 50+ people deep waiting for at least 30 minutes now at Denver Airport and no sign of the Hertz shuttle. I've seen ever other company's shuttle go through twice now. Logging into the website gives me an error. I'm a hertz gold presidential or whatever and will seriously reconsider hertz going forward. Unbelievable.

I had an unbelievable experience here! They gave me great service! They were super nice! Would rent from here again! The whole process was so smooth! They were amazing! They upgraded my rental for very cheap to give me a brand new vehicle! Hertz is the place to rent!

In the past I use to make regular reservation for a rental car, you hop in the shuttle at whatever airport you might be traveling to, you wait in maybe a short line but the last few years I’ve noticed the rental car people have consolidated …

Keep fuel receipts. This location now has charged me twice for “fuel shortages” after fully filling my tank prior to returning.  After the first incidence, I decided to keep all receipts. Served me well this time as I was able to …

Hertz rental at the Denver International Airport has a great selection of vehicles and the ease of picking up your vehicle is outstanding when you join and have the app. Their employees are outstanding with their customer service. I highly recommend them if you want a hassle free experience.

My rental process was the easiest I have ever experienced. I avoided the counter, selected all of my options online and was already assigned a car when I arrived. Walked to the car and exited. Quick and simple.

Quick, efficient easy access to get to Denver. I had the absolute best bus ride to the terminal! Dave M is a treasure.  What a wonderful way to start a long trip home with such a dedicated employee.  Dave is celebrating his 46th year as a Hertz employee.  Good job Hertz keeping such a rock star!!!

I had a great experience renting from Hertz at Denver Airport! Pickup was quick and easy, and the staff was super friendly. I got a Nissan Pathfinder, and wow!! what an awesome SUV! It was super clean, comfortable, and perfect for driving …

Seems like an incredibly long exit line at 11 AM on a Sunday.  Also, well, I really liked the choice of vehicles the SUV we picked up had an incredibly dirty windshield (on the inside). And I wouldn’t call the back “filthy“ but you can see …

I rented a car from Hertz at Denver Airport for a road trip across the central United States during the summer of 2023, and everything went perfectly. Pickup was fast, the staff was very professional, and the car was perfectly suited for a long journey.  I highly recommend Hertz Denver!

This is our 3rd time renting at Denver Airport Hertz. We keep coming back because this company is one of the best for customer service and transparency plus selection of cars. With our family, we always need a vehicle with 5-7 passenger …

Terrible experience. Look elsewhere if you want a quality rental and to be treated with respect. I prepaid for a 7 passenger vehicle to accommodate a large travel party. The 7 passenger vehicle that I reserved was not available. I was given …

Easy and quick pickup process. We enjoyed our rental jeep for touring the Rocky Mountains! Drop off was a breeze and took no time away from our airport arrival.

I give them a 2 star because at least the car drove. The workers are always nice. They advertise basic cars for $55 to $75, but after their fees, it's always double that price per day. Deceiving. That's just a side gripe. On top of all …

DIW rental was easy to pick up and drop off.  The hertz bus seemed to be slow to pick us up at the airport.  But for the return trip to the airport the bus was waiting for us after we returned the car. Very convenient.  The good thing about DIW is there is only one location for all airlines for pickup and drop off for the rental cars.
